mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_order ( merchant_id, user_id, table_id, order_no, total_amount, status, create_time ) VALUES ( #{merchantId}, #{userId}, #{table_id}, #{order_no}, #{total_amount}, #{status}, #{create_time} )
mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS time, SUM(total_amount) AS sales_volume FROM t_order WHERE status IN (2, 3) -- 统计已支付和已完成的订单 AND merchant_id = #{merchantId} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 7
